source.e96f1eef:
labels = ['No','Yes']
color = ['purple','violet']
explode =[0.0,0.05]
fontsize = 13

train['Survived'].value_counts().plot(kind = 'pie', startangle = 90,
                                      labels = labels,
                                      autopct = '%1.1f%%',
                                      colors = color,
                                      fontsize = fontsize,
                                      explode = explode)
plt.title('Survived',fontsize = 13)
plt.ylabel('')
source.922a8af1:
sns.countplot(x=train['Sex'],data = train,palette = 'Greens')
plt.xlabel('Male Vs Female',fontsize = 13)
plt.ylabel('Counts',fontsize = 13)
plt.title('Male Vs Female',fontsize = 13)
plt.show()
source.48de53d4:
fig = plt.figure()
plt.figure(figsize = (15,6))

plt.subplot(1,2,1)
sns.countplot(x=train['SibSp'],data = train,palette = 'viridis')
plt.xlabel('Sibling or Spouse',fontsize = 13)
plt.ylabel('Counts',fontsize = 13)

plt.subplot(1,2,2)
sns.countplot(x=train['Parch'],data = train,palette = 'cividis')
plt.xlabel('Parents or Children',fontsize = 13)
plt.ylabel('Counts',fontsize = 13)

plt.show()
